description: This file defines a React functional component named ProtectedRoute that controls access to certain routes based on user authentication status and roles. It includes a helper function to determine a user's default home page based on their role.

methods.name: roleHome(role)
methods.description: Determines the default home route based on the user's role.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ isAuthed, allowedRoles, userRole, redirectTo = "/login" })
methods.description: A React component that gatekeeps route access based on authentication and role permissions.

ctags.name: ProtectedRoute
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProtectedRoute({ isAuthed, allowedRoles, userRole, redirectTo = "\/login/
